reviews: I can't say about energy efficiency right now,
as it's installed yesterday.
[Updated]
It takes around 8 units for 9-9.30 hours usage daily, which is a lot less
As compared to my windows ac installed in 2012 which takes upto 12-13 units every day.and we used that ac lot less than this one. For energy efficiency go for it.
Let's talk about your room, if your room size is 110sq feet its good for that, takes 30 minutes to cool the room.
And you wants that moment when you feel really good(cold) at 21 temp set you need to wait for atleast wait for 1.30 hours after it you will start feeling cold.
And i bounght it for 29,750 which was on card discount.
Installation took rs 1000.
Yup, i know amazon says 599+18% GST.
AC is good but,

there is a problem with installation, the installation guy was somewhat insane, and did all the work with hammer than drilling bvoz light wasn't there at that time, and inverter could not take that load.And they don't wait for electricity to come. Bcoz of that there is a large impact on the wall other side(really a lot). Which is yet to be filled by cement.

AC is really good and I recommend people to buy this, I have read the reviews of other people, everyone is complaining about the installation, I was little lucky in this installation process, however I paid 700 installation charges (599+18% gst) and 750 for OD unit stand. Installation was really good and AC is must buy for the people who are looking in this range.
Regarding electricity need to wait for one month bill
Installed the product after lockdown yesterday. But the cooling is not working

ACis very much efficient in cooling. Received the packages in good condition. I had to bargain for outdoor stand which technician was initially charging for 900Rs. Later he agreed to my price when I said I already placed order for stand in Amazon for 500 rs in real. But still he charged 200 rs extra for OD stand. But he was a bit good in installation and no extra pipe needed. My question is what then standard installation charges covers?
Also the OD stand can locally may vost frtom 300rs and above. Please check all possibilities yourself and with technician regarding installation charges before you place appointment in hurry.
To the product I can give 5 ðŸŒŸ
It's good.. Gives fast cooling as I am using for 2 days. There is no issue as of now. Godrej must provide a outdoor stand unit along with the product.

About the installation Charges, in website it's mentioned 599 only only but the technician charged 1500 and I have also reacived a email from amazon that I have to pay 1500 to the technician. No clarity about the same.
My room size is 14 Ã— 11 sq ft which gets cooled in less than 5 mins so address the purpose of buying it. 4 star rating from my side
1 star rating deducted since there is no auto mode for swing, unable to reset time since button to reset clock is missing I'm remote which makes difficult to set sleep timer.
Super cooling capacity ......simply superb...

I installed it in a 100 sfty room, 9 ft hight & non terrace room but sunlight comes two side wall of the room very well..itâ€™s a very hot room. One day In 38 degree Celsius temperatures with 98% humidity I put on the ac in 24 degree temperature & a fan. with in 10 mnt the room become absolutely
Pleasant condition.......

Product is working all ok.

Cons:

Overall it's a nice automatic washing machine. I m 100% satisfied.Wud recommend to buy.
This product IS REALLY NICE and BEAUTIFUL
I'M GLAD TO BUY THIS PRODUCT

IT WAS BEST ONE THAN OTHER COMPANIES

Perfect for couples and bachelor's

reviews: Received damaged product. Could not close door of the fridge. Secondly product was not level. One area had a bigger knob causing product to tilt on one side. Worst part is we exchanged our old fridge for this.  So we are stuck with a defective product and all our food has perished.  Poor support.

Installation person informed that we need to buy a V Gaurd Stablizer which costs around 2600/- extra now because the existing stablizer will not work for this Refrigerator. Why this was not mentioned or highlighted while purchasing this? Now we need to spend another 2600/- for this.
Will write review on the product after using some time.
Well a very good product launched by Haier with very good amanities,with affordable price. Delivered on time, along with that installer came on time. Thanks to amazon :-)

Let me warn the potential customers from buying Haier refrigerator as the company uses cheap quality paint which starts chipping off and rusting after 1 year of use and though I took extended warranty from Amazon but the warranty service provider Acko refused saying that they do not cover it so check with Amazon. Amazon customer care had a different story to tell as she informed me that for the extended warranty the order ID was never generated at the time of my purchase so Amazon can't help while Acko did issue me a warranty document and they do have my warranty details
Also the brand Haier simply shrug off the responsibility by saying that they cannot help it since the brand warranty period of 1 year is over

I must say that Haier as well as Amazon cheated on me and I definitely would suggest not to go in for such poor quality products of Haier. Also do not get into the trap of Amazon as it charges for extended warranty and some third party service provider will never service the product.
So please avoid buying Haier refrigerator.

Maha bakwaas refrigerator. I used it as a convertible refrigerator from start. After six months when summer started I restored the freezer. To my surprise freezer never worked. I waited for few days for it to freeze some ice but it didn't.
I called up the engineer he came twice, checked and tried to fix it but still no ice. Then I registered a new complaint and now I'm waiting for the engineer to come back again.
I feel like throwing the refrigerator out of my balcony.

I will not exaggerate words. The Brand Haier and the Brand Amazon both are really good. Amazon kept its promise and delivered within the time and bought it at 18999 and 1000 extra Amazon payback. Haier personnel was at my doorstep within an hour or two after delivery and installed and gave tutorial very gently. Thanks Haier for such beautiful Product and services and thanks Amazon for such beautiful services and great discount. Amazon for a reason, by default reason. Thank you
About the product:- It is flawless and as same as the photo and description.
Seller:- 5star for seller

Delivery :- (this is the main point) Got it at last after calling 18 times to the customer care after 6 days of promising delivery date in kolkata West Bengal. Thank you Amazon atlast for overall performance.
Damaged product delivered, never expected, unsatisfied... Please do immediate replacement.. please

the installation process was smooth. amazon raises a service request. you do not have to do anything. the service engineer is adamant on whirlpool stand and stabilizer - will not accept any other stand. the product specs say stabilizer free operation. so add another Rs. 3000 odd to it. the microblock and odour control is misleading and does not seem to be working. you need to replace every 6 months....

I bought this Whirlpool 265 litres Convertible as mentioned in the product description but it really dont carry any meaning. Amazon and Whirlpool both together fooled me and doing the same with other customers. This is a plain refrigerator fridge section works as fridge and freezer section works as freezer its not convertible from Freezer to fridge and Fridge to freezer. This feature is not available but the company is promoting the product as Convertible. Please dont become pray and waste money on this  Whirlpool fridge instead try other brands which really gives you this feature. I spoke to couple of Amazon guys but they are blunt in resolving the issue, Amazon and Whirlpool both cheated me.
My last refrigerator was whirlpool, and very much satisfied using that one.
Even this one too.
Think this a simple marketing strategy like intellicool and convertible mode.
But the freeze is good ðŸ‘Œ and very much silent.
I think the plastic quality should have been more good.
The fridge came to me with a big dent on side.
Now coming to fridge specs
1. It is not at all convertible in any sense.
2. The width of fridge is very less which makes it's storage space impractical for use.
3. Very less space can be utilized for storing the things. Only a small pan can pe placed on each rack.
4. It took me almost 25 days to get a replacement after I had made around 100 calls to customer care of Amazon and Whirlpool. Very poor customer service.
Now to the good things
1. Looks good but very less width.
2. Energy efficient

I had a Whirlpool fridge. Amazon was good delivery from Amazon, its packing was good. Everything was correct but when the installation was done, and when it was turned on, the problem started on the third day itself and the water inside the freezer started filling up.  Ice also started to be in the entire freezer time waste money wast dont by this product

Ice forms and melts and then ices up again at the bottom of the freezer, seems there is not an efficient way for the water to escape, defrosted the refrigerator by turning it off there was a pool of water on the floor of the freezer, had to soak it up with a towel to get rid of it.  The technician who installed the refrigerator set up the freezer settings told me that was optimum with intellisense, then later filed a complaint and had a technician come who set the freezer to a different mode, said everything would be fine.  Not good still the same problem.  Frost free technology has been around for the last forty years, whirlpool has been in this business for ages, yet this product stinks, had a single door whirlpool before this still have it a single door not frost free, still works after 18 years.  Very disappointed with this product, stay away from it.

reviews: Best fridge on budget to notch perfomance. Don't buy any other from Samsung or whirlpool. Also it's smart fridge you can diagnose with nfc on mobile app. It's really good energy saver since installment my electricity bill increased only by 10rs. The best part to mention that it was delivered without single scratch by amazon.
I got it on sale too @21k. In shops they sell it @27k
Received an damaged product (side corner badly dented)
Caution: Reading this is going to take a while!!
Delivery:
The fridge was promptly delivered on delivery date. Technician from LG came on time for installation.
Vegetable compartment:
The vegetables don't stay fresh for more than a day. They (vegetables) start to lose their texture after 24 hours in the fridge. This thing needs improvement.
THE PROBLEM:
After few months of use, the freezer door had water vapour at its bottom part. I read the manual to check if temperature is as advised, temperature settings were correct.
First complaint to LG:
On calling LG they first told me to empty the fridge and leave doors open and power off for an hour, and the issue will be resolved.

I took the pain(as fridge had to be emptied ) to do as he asked but nothing changed.Then again after complaining a person came, told me issue is the handle cover, he removed it and said he will visit the next day again. But, to my surprise he closed my complaint saying it is resolved.
Second complaint to LG:

The same technician visited again this time he made video of the water leaking and sent it to someone at his office and said he could not figure out the problem and the decision will be made by his seniors about the course of action and I will be informed in the next 3 days about it. I got no call after 3 days so I called on the 5th day he said my senior will come to the visit. He and his senior made the video again and said headquarter will make a decision about it and I will be informed about it in the next 3 days( again).
I have talked to more than a dozen of LG employees till date. It has been more than 2 months of me keeping a faulty fridge at my house. and I am still waiting for a call from LG headquarter.
Verdict:
Don't go for this one as its not worth your bucks and the service of LG is not satisfying at all. Really dissappointed by LG.
UPDATE-

Recently talked to the customer care and scolding them they transferred their call to their chief. He said the door will be be change but not sure if leakage would stop. And to my surprise, he also warned me either change the door or he will close my complaint.
Update 2019 sept.-

The fridge continues to leak and now the cooling is reducing and the warranty is over so I have to pay for the repair but I will throw this fraud company's fridge in garbage instead of giving them any more penny from my pocket.
DON'T BUY IT

Its been little over three months using this product and we are happy with the performance. We used the regular microwave mode as well as convection mode for various items. The process was easy, while the result was good.

Further, we also tried the recipes given in the booklet. Personally we feel for some of the trivial things like rice and dal the pre-programmed time is more than the gas-cooking time which makes us question the use of microwave which is supposed to be efficient and hassle free cooking.

So according to us the only drawback is that if one sticks to pre-programmed recipes he/she might end up spending more time than required for gas-cooking. However, if you know how to use the microwave then it will complement your gas-cooking making the process more efficient.
Coming on to various aspects of product:
1) Design & look: Good
2) Built: Safe (please follow the instructions in the booklet for safe usage)
3) Performance: Satisfactory
4) Usability: Good
As mentioned earlier we have used this product little over three months now. So will come back to review on the long term usage and warranty later.

Let me warn the potential customers from buying Haier refrigerator as the company uses cheap quality paint which starts chipping off and rusting after 1 year of use and though I took extended warranty from Amazon but the warranty service provider Acko refused saying that they do not cover it so check with Amazon. Amazon customer care had a different story to tell as she informed me that for the extended warranty the order ID was never generated at the time of my purchase so Amazon can't help while Acko did issue me a warranty document and they do have my warranty details
Also the brand Haier simply shrug off the responsibility by saying that they cannot help it since the brand warranty period of 1 year is over

I must say that Haier as well as Amazon cheated on me and I definitely would suggest not to go in for such poor quality products of Haier. Also do not get into the trap of Amazon as it charges for extended warranty and some third party service provider will never service the product.
So please avoid buying Haier refrigerator.

Maha bakwaas refrigerator. I used it as a convertible refrigerator from start. After six months when summer started I restored the freezer. To my surprise freezer never worked. I waited for few days for it to freeze some ice but it didn't.
I called up the engineer he came twice, checked and tried to fix it but still no ice. Then I registered a new complaint and now I'm waiting for the engineer to come back again.
I feel like throwing the refrigerator out of my balcony.

I will not exaggerate words. The Brand Haier and the Brand Amazon both are really good. Amazon kept its promise and delivered within the time and bought it at 18999 and 1000 extra Amazon payback. Haier personnel was at my doorstep within an hour or two after delivery and installed and gave tutorial very gently. Thanks Haier for such beautiful Product and services and thanks Amazon for such beautiful services and great discount. Amazon for a reason, by default reason. Thank you

reviews: I gave 2 star not for the product. The product is superb it takes less electricity, worth buying. The two star os only for Amazon service. Really worst service from amazon.if you want buy small items from amazon and large appliances go directly to showroom and get it..
After 3 days am reviewing,no doubt is awesome product. I don't know someone reviewd one star(don't go buy that), dam good with features and performance..
Ice cubes very easy to remove
Convertible freezer ,u will have enough space, space is also fine. 3-4 members of family not for biger family.
Stylish
Work with invertor
Build quality is good
Less noise ,very very less
Performance good
U can operate from out side
One hour ice will form
Convertible is real good feature

the installation process was smooth. amazon raises a service request. you do not have to do anything. the service engineer is adamant on whirlpool stand and stabilizer - will not accept any other stand. the product specs say stabilizer free operation. so add another Rs. 3000 odd to it. the microblock and odour control is misleading and does not seem to be working. you need to replace every 6 months....

I bought this Whirlpool 265 litres Convertible as mentioned in the product description but it really dont carry any meaning. Amazon and Whirlpool both together fooled me and doing the same with other customers. This is a plain refrigerator fridge section works as fridge and freezer section works as freezer its not convertible from Freezer to fridge and Fridge to freezer. This feature is not available but the company is promoting the product as Convertible. Please dont become pray and waste money on this  Whirlpool fridge instead try other brands which really gives you this feature. I spoke to couple of Amazon guys but they are blunt in resolving the issue, Amazon and Whirlpool both cheated me.
My last refrigerator was whirlpool, and very much satisfied using that one.
Even this one too.
Think this a simple marketing strategy like intellicool and convertible mode.
But the freeze is good ðŸ‘Œ and very much silent.
I think the plastic quality should have been more good.
The fridge came to me with a big dent on side.
Now coming to fridge specs
1. It is not at all convertible in any sense.
2. The width of fridge is very less which makes it's storage space impractical for use.
3. Very less space can be utilized for storing the things. Only a small pan can pe placed on each rack.
4. It took me almost 25 days to get a replacement after I had made around 100 calls to customer care of Amazon and Whirlpool. Very poor customer service.
Now to the good things
1. Looks good but very less width.
2. Energy efficient

I had a Whirlpool fridge. Amazon was good delivery from Amazon, its packing was good. Everything was correct but when the installation was done, and when it was turned on, the problem started on the third day itself and the water inside the freezer started filling up.  Ice also started to be in the entire freezer time waste money wast dont by this product

Ice forms and melts and then ices up again at the bottom of the freezer, seems there is not an efficient way for the water to escape, defrosted the refrigerator by turning it off there was a pool of water on the floor of the freezer, had to soak it up with a towel to get rid of it.  The technician who installed the refrigerator set up the freezer settings told me that was optimum with intellisense, then later filed a complaint and had a technician come who set the freezer to a different mode, said everything would be fine.  Not good still the same problem.  Frost free technology has been around for the last forty years, whirlpool has been in this business for ages, yet this product stinks, had a single door whirlpool before this still have it a single door not frost free, still works after 18 years.  Very disappointed with this product, stay away from it.

reviews: Best fridge on budget to notch perfomance. Don't buy any other from Samsung or whirlpool. Also it's smart fridge you can diagnose with nfc on mobile app. It's really good energy saver since installment my electricity bill increased only by 10rs. The best part to mention that it was delivered without single scratch by amazon.
I got it on sale too @21k. In shops they sell it @27k
Received an damaged product (side corner badly dented)
Caution: Reading this is going to take a while!!
Delivery:
The fridge was promptly delivered on delivery date. Technician from LG came on time for installation.
Vegetable compartment:
The vegetables don't stay fresh for more than a day. They (vegetables) start to lose their texture after 24 hours in the fridge. This thing needs improvement.
THE PROBLEM:
After few months of use, the freezer door had water vapour at its bottom part. I read the manual to check if temperature is as advised, temperature settings were correct.
First complaint to LG:
On calling LG they first told me to empty the fridge and leave doors open and power off for an hour, and the issue will be resolved.

I took the pain(as fridge had to be emptied ) to do as he asked but nothing changed.Then again after complaining a person came, told me issue is the handle cover, he removed it and said he will visit the next day again. But, to my surprise he closed my complaint saying it is resolved.
Second complaint to LG:

The same technician visited again this time he made video of the water leaking and sent it to someone at his office and said he could not figure out the problem and the decision will be made by his seniors about the course of action and I will be informed in the next 3 days about it. I got no call after 3 days so I called on the 5th day he said my senior will come to the visit. He and his senior made the video again and said headquarter will make a decision about it and I will be informed about it in the next 3 days( again).
I have talked to more than a dozen of LG employees till date. It has been more than 2 months of me keeping a faulty fridge at my house. and I am still waiting for a call from LG headquarter.
Verdict:
Don't go for this one as its not worth your bucks and the service of LG is not satisfying at all. Really dissappointed by LG.
UPDATE-

Recently talked to the customer care and scolding them they transferred their call to their chief. He said the door will be be change but not sure if leakage would stop. And to my surprise, he also warned me either change the door or he will close my complaint.
Update 2019 sept.-

The fridge continues to leak and now the cooling is reducing and the warranty is over so I have to pay for the repair but I will throw this fraud company's fridge in garbage instead of giving them any more penny from my pocket.
DON'T BUY IT

Its been little over three months using this product and we are happy with the performance. We used the regular microwave mode as well as convection mode for various items. The process was easy, while the result was good.

Further, we also tried the recipes given in the booklet. Personally we feel for some of the trivial things like rice and dal the pre-programmed time is more than the gas-cooking time which makes us question the use of microwave which is supposed to be efficient and hassle free cooking.

So according to us the only drawback is that if one sticks to pre-programmed recipes he/she might end up spending more time than required for gas-cooking. However, if you know how to use the microwave then it will complement your gas-cooking making the process more efficient.
Coming on to various aspects of product:
1) Design & look: Good
2) Built: Safe (please follow the instructions in the booklet for safe usage)
3) Performance: Satisfactory
4) Usability: Good
As mentioned earlier we have used this product little over three months now. So will come back to review on the long term usage and warranty later.

  Writing this review aftr 2 months. Really good washing machine. So far I hd used LG n Samsung fully automatic washing machines. Bt this machine cleans cloths very effectively n in lesser water. First time seeing whie s actually white in washing machine.

dont buy incase you need to wash delicate clothes. otherwise its good.
it has no options of seperate wash for cotton, wool, delicates.
i wanted to return and buy another, but they are not ready to exchange....
After waiting 14 days it's found damaged ðŸ™„ðŸ˜¶.We trust in godrej company as past service and name.still they ready to replace same item in 4 days.. let's see ...Hope for best
Very Bad Machine.
AT THE TIME OF DRYing Drum Hit the sides of the machine (that usually happens in old semi automatic Machine) which makes lot of noise.
Cloths dosent dry as the spin  speed is also not good.
Top Door dosent have slow moving mechanism.  So if you just drop the door it fall like a stone with huge noise. Big drawback.
Washing is Ok
I returned it on last day of replacement period. Amazon accepted the replacement with no hassel.
This was my first Godrez product and i am disappointed with it.
Â Bought it yesterday, delivery was perfect. It' not very heavy.
Many people can set it up by themselves. I did it easily.
The bottom lid was tough to install though as it didn't fit properly. The biggest problem is the damn noise. it's unbearable.
Corrections:-
I didn't install the bottom lid perfectly so it was touching the motor and making that sound. So technician fixed it and it's working like charm.
I usually go in for Godrej products for their reliability and longevity of service. This product makes noises as if it needs a lubricant for smooth rotation.
I like the style, it fully automatic operation and easy to handle quality.

MACHINE IS NO DOUBT GOOD , BUT THE BEHAVIOUR OF TECHNICIAN WHO CAME FOR INSTALLATION WAS NOT AT ALL GOOD, AND I SHOULD SAY THAT THE TECHNICIAN WAS NOT UP TO THE MARK OF THE COMPANY NAME, HE TOTALLY SPOIL MY MOOD AND I STARTED THINKING THAT IF IT WOULD BE BETTER IF I HAD BOUGHT ANOTHER BRAND, AFTER THIS PURCHASE I HAVE DECIDED THAT I WILL NEVER BUY PRODUCT OF GODREJ
Got defective piece earlier however the seller replaced it promptly. The machine is working smoothly. It has all those functions that one need often in day to day use. Value for money.

reviews: Okay so here it goes, I ordered this fridge and it was missing a chiller column and the tray, instead there was a normal hardened glass shelf intead of the chiller compartment as shown in the product description.
I wanted to exchange the product and request for the same and a new fridge was sent with the same missing error.
I decided to keep the first product and returned the new one because of the obvious reasons and I wanted the same fridge as it was fitting my budget.
It's not even two months and this fridge has a loud motor noise, leaks water, and looses the cool which is spoiling all the items on the refrigerator.
I need to refund this pathetic product.
It sucks big time.
*WASTE OF MONEY*
*POOREST QUALITY*
DO NOT PURCHASE.
@AMAZON, PLEASE TAKE THIS ITEM BACK TO YOUR DUMP AND PUT A FIRE ON IT.
THANKS,
Yours truly
Siddharth Chawla
Excellent product for the price...
Â Reviewed aftee 1 week use..
It's really value for money.. In this budget double door of well known brand with all best features is really gud..
Storage capacity is also accurate.. You can keep well organized..
Stand is not required for this refrigerator.. It is easily movable.
Product delivery & installation was on time. We noticed lot of noise from the motor and some times it's irritating.

Refrigerator was delivered on 22nd July. Worked fine until August 1st And after that suddenly stopped working. Called customer care and they said they have lodged the complaint. When checked next day came to know that there was no complaint raised. Submitted complaint online. Waiting for technician to come and have a look. My bad luck , it just stopped working exactly after 1 day of replacement period.
Can amazon help to replace the product as its just one day more after replacement period when it sopped working.
Everything went well and the fridge is working smoothly.

One issue with the fridge is, there was a dent. The dent was identified by the technician while unpacking the item. As I didn't have any issue with the working condition of the fridge, I have ignored it.
Second issue is with the technician, he was promoting to buy items offline, rather than online and was least bothered in installation and explaining the features of the fridge.
Comparative to my previous fridge, this one makes more noise.

I m not satisfied with this product I have to invite three time to solve problem of cooling, itâ€™s always need machinists. Itâ€™s past only 28 days of purchased, I want to returned the product but amazon window of returning is closed on 1st August, shameful
Happy to buy this Godrej refrigerator.... Perfect product from Indian co at very reasonable price.... It's being more than week now.... Fully satisfied...

reviews: Received damaged product. Could not close door of the fridge. Secondly product was not level. One area had a bigger knob causing product to tilt on one side. Worst part is we exchanged our old fridge for this.  So we are stuck with a defective product and all our food has perished.  Poor support.

Installation person informed that we need to buy a V Gaurd Stablizer which costs around 2600/- extra now because the existing stablizer will not work for this Refrigerator. Why this was not mentioned or highlighted while purchasing this? Now we need to spend another 2600/- for this.
Will write review on the product after using some time.
Well a very good product launched by Haier with very good amanities,with affordable price. Delivered on time, along with that installer came on time. Thanks to amazon :-)

Let me warn the potential customers from buying Haier refrigerator as the company uses cheap quality paint which starts chipping off and rusting after 1 year of use and though I took extended warranty from Amazon but the warranty service provider Acko refused saying that they do not cover it so check with Amazon. Amazon customer care had a different story to tell as she informed me that for the extended warranty the order ID was never generated at the time of my purchase so Amazon can't help while Acko did issue me a warranty document and they do have my warranty details
Also the brand Haier simply shrug off the responsibility by saying that they cannot help it since the brand warranty period of 1 year is over

I must say that Haier as well as Amazon cheated on me and I definitely would suggest not to go in for such poor quality products of Haier. Also do not get into the trap of Amazon as it charges for extended warranty and some third party service provider will never service the product.
So please avoid buying Haier refrigerator.

Maha bakwaas refrigerator. I used it as a convertible refrigerator from start. After six months when summer started I restored the freezer. To my surprise freezer never worked. I waited for few days for it to freeze some ice but it didn't.
I called up the engineer he came twice, checked and tried to fix it but still no ice. Then I registered a new complaint and now I'm waiting for the engineer to come back again.
I feel like throwing the refrigerator out of my balcony.

I will not exaggerate words. The Brand Haier and the Brand Amazon both are really good. Amazon kept its promise and delivered within the time and bought it at 18999 and 1000 extra Amazon payback. Haier personnel was at my doorstep within an hour or two after delivery and installed and gave tutorial very gently. Thanks Haier for such beautiful Product and services and thanks Amazon for such beautiful services and great discount. Amazon for a reason, by default reason. Thank you
About the product:- It is flawless and as same as the photo and description.
Seller:- 5star for seller

Delivery :- (this is the main point) Got it at last after calling 18 times to the customer care after 6 days of promising delivery date in kolkata West Bengal. Thank you Amazon atlast for overall performance.
Damaged product delivered, never expected, unsatisfied... Please do immediate replacement.. please

reviews: I gave 2 star not for the product. The product is superb it takes less electricity, worth buying. The two star os only for Amazon service. It is the worst customer service and delivery service I have met. It was open box verification so delivery guy kept fridge in hall and took photo. Once photo is taken the moves the fridge from hall to kitchen at that time the delivery guy broke the fridge.when I spoke with Amazon customer service they are not responding good and the delivery guy is too harsh. Really worst service from amazon.if you want buy small items from amazon and large appliances go directly to showroom and get it..
After 3 days am reviewing,no doubt is awesome product. I don't know someone reviewd one star(don't go buy that), dam good with features and performance..
Ice cubes very easy to remove
Convertible freezer ,u will have enough space, space is also fine. 3-4 members of family not for biger family.
Stylish
Work with invertor
Build quality is good
Less noise ,very very less
Performance good
U can operate from out side
One hour ice will form
Convertible is real good feature

the installation process was smooth. amazon raises a service request. you do not have to do anything. the service engineer is adamant on whirlpool stand and stabilizer - will not accept any other stand. the product specs say stabilizer free operation. so add another Rs. 3000 odd to it. the microblock and odour control is misleading and does not seem to be working. you need to replace every 6 months....

I bought this Whirlpool 265 litres Convertible as mentioned in the product description but it really dont carry any meaning. Amazon and Whirlpool both together fooled me and doing the same with other customers. This is a plain refrigerator fridge section works as fridge and freezer section works as freezer its not convertible from Freezer to fridge and Fridge to freezer. This feature is not available but the company is promoting the product as Convertible. Please dont become pray and waste money on this  Whirlpool fridge instead try other brands which really gives you this feature. I spoke to couple of Amazon guys but they are blunt in resolving the issue, Amazon and Whirlpool both cheated me.
My last refrigerator was whirlpool, and very much satisfied using that one.
Even this one too.
Think this a simple marketing strategy like intellicool and convertible mode.
But the freeze is good ðŸ‘Œ and very much silent.
I think the plastic quality should have been more good.
The fridge came to me with a big dent on side.
Now coming to fridge specs
1. It is not at all convertible in any sense.
2. The width of fridge is very less which makes it's storage space impractical for use.
3. Very less space can be utilized for storing the things. Only a small pan can pe placed on each rack.
4. It took me almost 25 days to get a replacement after I had made around 100 calls to customer care of Amazon and Whirlpool. Very poor customer service.
Now to the good things
1. Looks good but very less width.
2. Energy efficient

I had a Whirlpool fridge. Amazon was good delivery from Amazon, its packing was good. Everything was correct but when the installation was done, and when it was turned on, the problem started on the third day itself and the water inside the freezer started filling up.  Ice also started to be in the entire freezer time waste money wast dont by this product

Ice forms and melts and then ices up again at the bottom of the freezer, seems there is not an efficient way for the water to escape, defrosted the refrigerator by turning it off there was a pool of water on the floor of the freezer, had to soak it up with a towel to get rid of it.  The technician who installed the refrigerator set up the freezer settings told me that was optimum with intellisense, then later filed a complaint and had a technician come who set the freezer to a different mode, said everything would be fine.  Not good still the same problem.  Frost free technology has been around for the last forty years, whirlpool has been in this business for ages, yet this product stinks, had a single door whirlpool before this still have it a single door not frost free, still works after 18 years.  Very disappointed with this product, stay away from it.

Â I am reviewing after two weeks of use. It is a stylish and elegant look refrigerator that  definitely reflect your rich choice in the kitchen. Very silent operation, no nose so far. Special feature of this one is the curd making, you can prepared a perfect curd in just 6-7 hours w/o bothering about the weather.
Got it delivered 2 days before the promised date.
1. Delivery:  was hassle free but the cartoon was torn from some places. My rating - 3/5.
2. Cooling : Cooling is super fast, satisfied. My rating - 4.5/5
3. Energy efficiency: As it is rated 3 star should be good, can't say right now. My rating - 4/5.
4. Storage capacity is quite less, should be sufficient for a family of 3-4 people. If you are expecting of good capacity then should go for 260 -280L or above. My rating - 3/5.

5. Features: It has a digital display and a button on the door to toggel the desired temperature. And one in the deep freezer. In my opinion one more toggle should have been provided for the normal compartment.
Has an alert mechanism which starts beeping when you keep the door open for too long abd starts blinking the lights if we keep open for too much time. My rating - 3.5/5.

5. Demo by the Samsung technician: The Technician arrived very next day of delivery and i am fully satisfied by the demo provided , he followed good safety rulea by wearing masks and maintaining social distancing, provided me complete demo. My rating - 5/5.
Overall rating : 3.9 - Good
Both the images are of different sides.
Leveling issues because one side is damaged. Product is good bt bcz body is damaged so m giving one star.. Once recieve the correct one. Will write review again.

It is a 3* refrigerator with special feature of curd making and storage. Will update the review after experiencing the same. Will also update the power consumption experience after one month. There is little humming sound and slight vibration. But, not as much  as my earlier single door fridge which was almost like a generator.

Meanwhile pls avoid buying these large appliances online till Amazon India learns how to deliver these without damage. Returned a damaged item, but again got a damaged item as replacement. It pains a lot to use a new item which is damaged. Very important lesson that we should buy these from nearby shops who ensure proper delivery without damage.

reviews: Best fridge on budget to notch perfomance. Don't buy any other from Samsung or whirlpool. Also it's smart fridge you can diagnose with nfc on mobile app. It's really good energy saver since installment my electricity bill increased only by 10rs. The best part to mention that it was delivered without single scratch by amazon.
I got it on sale too @21k. In shops they sell it @27k
Received an damaged product (side corner badly dented)
Caution: Reading this is going to take a while!!
Delivery:
The fridge was promptly delivered on delivery date. Technician from LG came on time for installation.
Vegetable compartment:
The vegetables don't stay fresh for more than a day. They (vegetables) start to lose their texture after 24 hours in the fridge. This thing needs improvement.
THE PROBLEM:
After few months of use, the freezer door had water vapour at its bottom part. I read the manual to check if temperature is as advised, temperature settings were correct.
First complaint to LG:
On calling LG they first told me to empty the fridge and leave doors open and power off for an hour, and the issue will be resolved.

I took the pain(as fridge had to be emptied ) to do as he asked but nothing changed.Then again after complaining a person came, told me issue is the handle cover, he removed it and said he will visit the next day again. But, to my surprise he closed my complaint saying it is resolved.
Second complaint to LG:

The same technician visited again this time he made video of the water leaking and sent it to someone at his office and said he could not figure out the problem and the decision will be made by his seniors about the course of action and I will be informed in the next 3 days about it. I got no call after 3 days so I called on the 5th day he said my senior will come to the visit. He and his senior made the video again and said headquarter will make a decision about it and I will be informed about it in the next 3 days( again).
I have talked to more than a dozen of LG employees till date. It has been more than 2 months of me keeping a faulty fridge at my house. and I am still waiting for a call from LG headquarter.
Verdict:
Don't go for this one as its not worth your bucks and the service of LG is not satisfying at all. Really dissappointed by LG.
UPDATE-

Recently talked to the customer care and scolding them they transferred their call to their chief. He said the door will be be change but not sure if leakage would stop. And to my surprise, he also warned me either change the door or he will close my complaint.
Update 2019 sept.-

The fridge continues to leak and now the cooling is reducing and the warranty is over so I have to pay for the repair but I will throw this fraud company's fridge in garbage instead of giving them any more penny from my pocket.
DON'T BUY IT
